entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
